summary: Multi-part paper series marked as duplicates: Part I (low-energy properties) vs Part II (microscopic theory) have 95% Jaccard similarity but are distinct papers

part_1.title: Theory of quantum Hall Smectic Phase. I. Low-energy properties

part_2.title: Theory of quantum Hall Smectic Phase. II. Microscopic theory

notes: Only difference is Roman numeral (I vs II) and subtitle (Low-energy properties vs Microscopic theory). Unigram Jaccard can't distinguish because only 1-2 tokens differ out of ~20 total. Bigram Jaccard would help (Phase. I. vs Phase. II. are different bigrams). Numeric token boosting would also flag Roman numeral differences as significant.
